amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, sought to cap the authorization level in the bill for FY 2010 at the FY 2008 level of $405 million. The amendment also sought to provide such sums as may be necessary for FY 2011 through FY 2014.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-39 to set an authorization for AmeriCorps, the Trust, Innovative programs, audits and evaluations at the FY 2008 level for FY 2010, and as such sums as may be necessary for fiscal years 2011 through 2014.

action.text: Roe (TN) amendment (A005) modified by unanimous consent. The amendment is technical in nature.
On agreeing to the Roe (TN) amendment (A005) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 175 - 256 (Roll no. 135).
